name: pdfpig
description: Guidance for PdfPig PDF reading and content extraction library for .NET. USE FOR: extracting text from PDFs, reading PDF metadata, extracting images from PDF pages, word-level and letter-level text extraction, searching PDF content, analyzing PDF document structure. DO NOT USE FOR: creating or generating PDFs (use PdfSharpCore or QuestPDF), editing existing PDFs, PDF form filling, rendering PDFs to images.
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
